text: "As If" is a song recorded by American country music artist Sara Evans for her 2007 Greatest Hits compilation album. ==Music video== The music video for "As If" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on August 2, 2007. The video debuted at number 17 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of August 30, 2007. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Country songs Category:Sara Evans songs
title: As If
